title: Business Requirements Document for 3T: The Children's Tic Tac Toe App
description: A business requirements document outlining the strategic goals for '3T', a mobile Tic Tac Toe application designed specifically for young children. The product aims to provide an engaging, educational, and fun experience through a colorful and intuitive interface, playful feedback, and a unique AI coaching feature that supports learning and positive social play.
objectives: Create a highly engaging and fun gameplay experience for young children through vibrant visuals, playful sound effects, and rewarding animations.
Develop an intuitive user interface that allows young children to easily navigate and play the game independently in both single-player and local two-player modes.
Incorporate a supportive AI coach to provide helpful hints and positive reinforcement, fostering strategic thinking and problem-solving skills.
Facilitate safe and positive social interaction by encouraging cooperative play through a shared-screen, two-player mode.
Provide immediate and clear feedback for player actions, wins, losses, and draws to maintain engagement and support the learning process.
